english.name: Stomach-turning
english.meaning: Feel angry or upset about something

english.name: Just so you know
english.example: Just so you know, we're going to have a team retreat next month

english.name: Retreat (v) (n)
english.example: She bursts into tears and retreats to the bedroom

english.name: Too much on my plate
english.example: Thong told me he had too much on his plate, that's why his performance us getting worse

english.name: In fire
english.example: We're in fire, let's stay calmed and do whatever we can

english.name: Get rid of
english.meaning: Từ bỏ (một thói quen, công việc đang làm)
english.example: I'm trying to get rid of going sleep late

english.name: Here you go
english.example: A: Can I have some coffee ? B: Here you go

english.name: Tech-savvy
english.example: John is definitely not a tech-savvy guy. It took him hours to turn on PC. Goddam !
